short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal skincare assistant for identifying acne-safe products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopping for skincare and beauty products just got easier with AcneSafe, a Chrome extension designed to help you make smarter, skin-friendly choices.

If you have acne-prone or sensitive skin, you know how important it is to avoid pore-clogging ingredients that can lead to breakouts. With AcneSafe, you’ll instantly know if a product contains non-comedogenic ingredients or not—without leaving the site.

Say goodbye to clogged pores and hello to smarter shopping!
